name: vyardage
description: Virtual yardage book to improve your scores in the World Golf Tour game.

scripts.postinstall: npm run install:client && npm run install:server
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm run build && rm -rf ../server/public/ && cp -r build/ ../server/public
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.test: docker-compose build test-app && docker-compose run tests; docker-compose down
scripts.dev: docker-compose up db adminer app; exit 0
scripts.dev:migrate: docker-compose up -d db && docker-compose run app npm run migrate; docker-compose down
